## aads campaigns update

Update a campaign

```
aads campaigns update [flags]
```

### Options

```
      --budget string         New total budget
      --countries string      Comma-separated country codes
      --daily-budget string   New daily budget
  -h, --help                  help for update
      --id int                Campaign ID
      --name string           New name
      --status string         ENABLED or PAUSED
```
